    • Method Detail

      • isStrictMode

        public boolean isStrictMode()

      • getRootPath

        public String getRootPath()
        Base path for all controllers.

      • getImageServerUrl

        public String getImageServerUrl()
        URL for this ImageServer instance. In case a local client will be created, this will be the base url for requesting images.

      • getStrictMode

        public Boolean getStrictMode()
        Should ImageServer be operating in strict mode. If so any ImageRequestHashBuilder will be ignored and only requests for registered resolutions will be accepted. This matches the behaviour of ImageServer pre-4.x.x. Enabling strict mode can have a slight performance gain.

        Type: boolean, default: false

      • getAccessToken

        public String getAccessToken()
        Access token required for secured services.

        Type: string

      • getMd5HashToken

        public String getMd5HashToken()
        Token to use for a default Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder. Will only be used if ImageServer is not in strict mode.

        Be aware that changing the hash token or security hash mechanism can render all existing image urls for non-registered resolutions invalid.

      • getCreateLocalClient

        public Boolean getCreateLocalClient()
        Should a LocalImageServerClient instance be created for this ImageServer. If true the instance will be created and exposed so dependant modules can use it.

        Type: boolean, default: false

      • getStreaming

        public StreamingSettings getStreaming()

      • getStore

        public StoreSettings getStore()

      • getTransformers

        public TransformersSettings getTransformers()

      • setRootPath

        public void setRootPath(String rootPath)
        Base path for all controllers.

      • setImageServerUrl

        public void setImageServerUrl(String imageServerUrl)
        URL for this ImageServer instance. In case a local client will be created, this will be the base url for requesting images.

      • setStrictMode

        public void setStrictMode(Boolean strictMode)
        Should ImageServer be operating in strict mode. If so any ImageRequestHashBuilder will be ignored and only requests for registered resolutions will be accepted. This matches the behaviour of ImageServer pre-4.x.x. Enabling strict mode can have a slight performance gain.

        Type: boolean, default: false

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(String accessToken)
        Access token required for secured services.

        Type: string

      • setMd5HashToken

        public void setMd5HashToken(String md5HashToken)
        Token to use for a default Md5ImageRequestHashBuilder. Will only be used if ImageServer is not in strict mode.

        Be aware that changing the hash token or security hash mechanism can render all existing image urls for non-registered resolutions invalid.

      • setCreateLocalClient

        public void setCreateLocalClient(Boolean createLocalClient)
        Should a LocalImageServerClient instance be created for this ImageServer. If true the instance will be created and exposed so dependant modules can use it.

        Type: boolean, default: false
